specifications.description: THE BARON P-D01 CUE FEATURES A FOREARM AND SLEEVE CRAFTED FROM MAPLE WOOD, BLACK LEATHER WRAP. SUITABLE FOR PLAYERS OF ALL SKILL LEVELS, FROM BEGINNERS TO ADVANCED.
